ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Horizons (was Official confirmation from Ester)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The funding issue is solved.  They plan to go to Beta early 2001.  They are currently planning on a 1 year Beta with 4 phases.  From what Doug and David
ygData.messageBody:
>Assuming they get future additional funding, when is Horizons scheduled for
>release? Based on what I read, if they don't get the funding the project
>will fall through, which will be a shame based on the promise of this game.
>
>Galtin of E'ci

The funding issue is solved. They plan to go to Beta early 2001. They are
currently planning on a 1 year Beta with 4 phases. From what Doug and David
have relayed recently they received more funding offers than they felt
comfortable accepting. My only fear is that they are planning on so much
content that it may become a daunting task to avoid scope creep.

Kit
